text: Jane, remember to take your time. Managing bipolar is a journey, not a sprint.
The River City Arts Fest was so inspiring! Your photography really stood out.
I'm here for you, Jane. We can talk about the diagnosis whenever you're ready.
Don't forget, your therapy appointment is tomorrow at 10 AM.
That article you sent me about coping with bipolar disorder was really insightful.
You're so brave, Jane. Facing your challenges head-on is admirable.
How are you feeling about the medication change? Any side effects?
Happy Valentine's Day, Jane! Sending you lots of love and positive vibes today.
